resp.text: Thanks for the great review!

name: Jasper Cleage
text: I originally intended Dr. Waldrop to be a 2nd opinion, but his explanation of my issue and how he could fix it eased my mind and I chose to go with his surgical path.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Jeff Lapidus
text: Dr. Waldrop took the time to listen to my concerns and answered my questions completely. Very satisfied.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review!

name: Ashley McGuire
text: Great experience he really listened to what I had to say

resp.text: Thanks for the positive feedback!

name: Lexie Corder
text: He is the best surgeon I have ever met and came in contact with. He is such a genuine, kind-hearted person, who takes his time with his patients to make sure they feel listened to and are special. He is very knowledgeable about his specialty and will go above-and-beyond to make sure you can do all the things you love to do. I went to SO many doctors telling me I would never do what I love to do most., dance, ever again. When I met him and started talking to him, he knew exactly how to fix me and knew I had a passion for dance and did absolutely any and everything to get me back to 100% and I am today. I have no problems with my foot I had surgery on and I am teaching several fitness classes and am in my university's dance team. I cannot thank Dr. Norman Waldrop and his staff enough for their constant kindness, determination, and support during this trying time. I love every single one of them and know that they are still changing lives and making the impossible possible to this day and will never stop.

resp.text: Lexie, thank you so much for the kind words.

name: Nathalie Alarcon
text: It was difficult chapter in my life to break my ankle. Dr. Waldrop and his team has helped me tremendously. I am currently in physical therapy and they are absolutely professional with protocol. You have to maintain patient during the healing stage and once you follow directions. I do highly recommend. I pray I don't have to return on any injury in the near future, but if I were to Dr. Waldrop is the one who is the expert specialist on my ankle treatment.

resp.text: Nathalie, I'm so glad you had a great experience! We appreciate your review and look forward to helping you continue to heal.

name: George Larson
text:
Dr. Waldrop is the most kind, caring surgeon I have come across.  I have had multiple opinions of a complex problem and he made me feel the most comfortable by far.  He took the time to explain the options, going through the pros and cons of each.  He makes you feel comfortable from the beginning.  My results were impeccable and will be indebted to him.

His practice is very busy.  No one wants a surgeon that is not busy,  they are that way for a reason.  There is a reason his practice is busy,  its because he is the best.  Remember,  you don't want a surgeon who is not busy!

Thanks again!

name: Nancy Green
text: I highly recommend Dr. Norman Waldrop at Andrews Sports Medicine.  He took his time with me, answered all my questions and is knowledgeable. Five stars for him!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, and for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Diane Brittain
text: I became a patient of Dr. Waldrop’s when I broke my ankle several years ago.  I received excellent care, concern and communication from Dr. Waldrop and his staff at Andrews.  I have joked with Dr. Waldrop that I needed to have him on retainer as I broke my foot again about a year and a half later.  I’ve had two more surgeries on the same foot.  There are not enough accolades for Dr. Waldrop and his staff. They are always friendly,  courteous and take the time to explain everything in detail.  They make you feel like you are their only patient.  Thank you for all of your care.

resp.text: Diane, thanks so much for trusting in me and my awesome team. We appreciate your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Regina Tucker
text: Dr Waldrop is the best of the best! I highly recommend him to anyone having ankle/foot problems.  I trust him to make the right decision for treatment of my fused ankle that had a severe compound fracture years ago 8 surgeries later he is the only doctor I will use.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Regina. Also, thanks for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Arthur Turner
text: I had surgery on my ankle Dr. Waldron and his staff was great in providing me with everything I needed to recover. I highly recommend him to people with foot and ankle issues.

resp.text: We’re so glad you had a great experience!

name: Dianne Coleman PhD
text: I would highly recommend Dr. Waldrop! I broke my ankle in three complex places and Dr. Waldrop, with his God-Giving talents, repaired my ankle.  I am still  under his care and on the road to a full recovery.

resp.text: Dianne, thank you for trusting in me and my team and for taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to continue helping you heal.

name: John L. Robinson
text: Dr. Waldrop and his staff - all are first class in all respects.  They give you the best medical care.  Fantastic skills diagnosing the issue and he's without a doubt a very skilled surgeon.  Also, his bedside manner is excellent.  Simply put, he's the only doctor I'd see for a foot or ankle problem.  I think the other reviews that are one-star are insane.

resp.text: John, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with Dr. Waldrop and his team.

name: Suzanne McAllister
text:
Dr. Waldrop did a fantastic job of rebuilding my ankle five years ago after it was crushed by my horse. Earlier this year I was having problems with the other ankle, but Dr. Waldrop would not see me because they did not consider me a surgical candidate.  I went to another surgeon who assured me that he could relieve the problem. Bad mistake. 8 months and a great amount of pain later, I finally found a new ankle specialist who will try to repair the damage done by the other surgeon. Dr 2aldrop would not see me until I was a year out from first surgery. By then damage might have been irreparable.
IF you can get in to see Dr. Waldrop is is VERY GOOD at his job.

He is back playing football and about to start basketball and we could ask for anything more.  Thanks!

text: Amazing surgeon! Awesome bedside manner. Prompt on appointments. Great personable staff. I would highly recommend this doctor and this facility!

text: Dr. Waldrop is the best. I highly recommend him and Andrews!!

name: MG Thompson
text: The BEST doctor and the BEST Team!  My family has used Dr. Waldrop and Andrews for years.  Awesome experience every time.  Thanks!

name: Marc Cormack
text: I would highly recommend Dr. Waldrop because he is an incredible surgeon, as well as a really good person. I was 61 years old when I went to see him with recurring ankle pain and swelling. These problems were due to multiple ankle sprains incurred playing sports over the years. The MRI showed it was a mess....torn tendons with bits of bone attached, arthritis, etc. He thoroughly explained the surgery that would be necessary to fix it, and we set a date. It has been 2 years since he performed the surgery, and I continue to walk without pain, and I have never had the heavy pain with swelling come back.  It couldn't have been a better experience!

name: Katherine Cobbs
text: By almost all accounts my achilles rupture repair seems perfect. I won’t be an ankle model anytime in my future, but Dr. Waldrop tells me the lump is “just the way you healed.” Some styles of shoes are a pain to wear because of it (a bummer for a gal), but at least my ankle is no longer hurting and my mobility is back to normal levels.

resp.text: Thank you, Katherine.

name: Jeremy Sumrall
text: Top notch.

resp.text: Thanks for the positive feedback!

name: Amanda Golden
text: Dr. Waldrop fixed my sons foot up perfectly. We appreciate his expertise. We didn’t really require extra time, so weren’t offended with the short visit.

name: Andy Coats
text: Dr. Waldrop did some "miracle" work on my achilles.  He discussed two options for my achilles insertional calcific tendinosis.  Surgery or PRP.  I had the PRP treatment and within 2 days my ankle was as good as new.  Many docs would have only done the surgery with a much longer recovery.  Thank you Dr. Waldrop!

name: Paisley Pineapple Boutique
text: Wonderful, friendly, thorough doctor. Did an excellent job on my ankle tendon repair and seems to be a friendly, too-notch, guy all the way around.

name: Diann Barrett
text: Dr. Waldron was awesome all around.  Office staff and all personnel very nice!  He was awesome!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Diann!

name: Mel D
text: My review is in response to the 1 star review. I have had a great experience with Dr. Waldrop and the staff at Andrews Sports medicine. I just had my 3rd follow up appt with Dr. Waldrop after my foot surgery six weeks ago. My foot is doing great! He always checks my foot himself, including doing my last X-ray himself. He personally provides instruction and maintains expectations so you are prepared and feel a bit in control. The follow up appointments are quick, which means the wait times are very short, a rarity in doctors offices. But he has always been friendly and answered my few concerns. It's all a balancing act and for me, a skilled surgeon with a great staff (who also answer emails) and very limited waiting times has been very enjoyable.

name: Michelle Black
text:
Had foot fusion by this quack.  First, the fusion was for 3-4 joints in his words would "most likely alleviate the pain".  But not until way after surgery found out he fused ankle.  I run, kayak, horseback ride, bike, well lest say I did!  Never going to be able to now!!!  He swears he tells you about recovery and what he is going to do but, do not have telepathy, because none of those wordsl never left his lips so I am assuming only in his head.  Just go to someone else and get another opinion.  Dr.cordover that works there is fantastic, I only wish instead of back and neck specialty he could have covered this.

Update since February 2018 I hurt worse than did before surgery.  Foot was put in wrong position cause waldrWa was upset taking too long and going on vacation.   I am disabled where before I some quality of life.  Now in so much pain and caused spine, hip and ect.  Nothing libes up or can have normal quality of life.

name: Stefanie Cotter
text: Dr. Waldrop was very comforting to a very nervous mom and teen!  He did a wonderful job, and we avoided surgery!

resp.text: Thank you for the kinds words and for taking the time to rate your experience.

name: Julie Price
text: Dr. Waldrop is a very arrogant and uncaring physician. His nurse practictioner takes on the same attitude, she was as crass and insulting as they come. She is that way because he is that way. There is a single word to describe her that I will for integrity sake leave out. My surgery consultation was on Thursday and he was very willing to schedule my surgery for the following Monday however would not tell me what he planned to do procedure wise. I had many uneasy feelings due to his haughty attitude but continued to ask questions so I could make a well informed decision about my surgery. He talked down to me like I was an uneducated piece of garbage and had no sense. Still trying to overlook the insults, I continued to attempt to ask questions, but was rudely shut down as he walked right out the door with me still asking for information. I was very shocked and upset about the entire experience because my family/I have always had such wonderful experiences with the doctors/surgeons of Andrews Sports Medicine. I am rather taken back that they continue to allow such a fester to be a part of their team. I left there and immediately searched for another surgeon AND facility. He now gives me apprehensions about Andrews judgement in allowing him to continue to practice there. My thoughts were, he may be a good surgeon but who in their right mind would want that hateful and uncaring of a person to DO the surgery and then be THE person they rely on for the next 6-8 months in healing/recovery. He does not deserve the one star I had to choose in doing my review. Please don’t waste your time with him. He & his nurse practitioner are NOT the caring and compassionate people that doctors and nurses are called to be.***Oh...never even saw one of the many X-rays that were taken of my foot. Never discussed it or even offered to show it to me...doubt that he even looked at it to be honest. ARROGANT MAN...not what a doctor should be. I have now learned from others who won’t take the time to post that they were treated the same way. They just moved on to other doctors because of the same exact mannerisms.

name: lisa strong
text: My experience is always great with Dr. Waldrop and his staff ! He is one of Gods blessings for me ..he's one of my angels and I thank him and his staff for helping me to walk without pain. God bless you all at Andrews Sports Medicine & Orthopaedic Center 😊

name: Kathy Christy
text: I went to St. Vincent TOC in Birmingham to get a second opinion on an ankle injury. The Dr. I saw was Dr. Norman E. Waldrop III. Dr. Waldrop was very friendly. His staff was friendly and I have only once had to wait 30 past my appointment time. Dr. Waldrop is the only surgeon that took time to listen and propose an approach that took a less invasive step first. There are times I have noticed his demeanor seems rushed, matter of fact, or less talkative but he has never been rude or talked down to me. I drive 2 hours to visit his office. My drive down is longer than my wait and visit combined. Here locally, the TOC branch has kept me waiting in the lobby 3 hours beyond my appointment time plus an additional 50 minutes in the patient room. I highly recommend Dr. Waldrop.

name: Laurie Franklin
text: I would highly recommend Dr. Waldrop, he is incredibly awesome❤️

resp.text: We’re so glad you had a great experience! Thanks for the great review!  We appreciate your review and look forward to helping you continue to heal.

name: Heath Stone
text: If I could give a negative star number, I would, because I don't think that Dr. Waldrop deserves the one start that I had to choose. He is one of the most uncompassionate people that my family has ever encountered. It's very apparent that he does not care about his patients, but only the number of patients he sees a day, and how much money he can get from them. My family drives 2 hours just to go to an appointment and within 45 seconds into the visit, he is already standing by the door with his hand on the knob, ready to leave. He has no heart for his patients and seems to be very cocky and arrogant. Once he does any type of surgery on you, and has your money, he seems to wash his hands of you, because he thinks his job is done. He is a "know-it- all" and doesn't respect his patients enough to take time to listen to questions or concerns. After several visits to him, with my mother breaking down into tears just in the hallway, we are choosing that "enough is enough!". It doesn't matter if we have to drive halfway across the state to find a new doctor,  it will be well worth it, not to ever have to deal with Dr. Waldrop again.

text: Best foot and ankle Doctor & a super nice guy!  I can walk again bc of Dr. Waldrop "Thank You"!

text: Good didn't like the hour wait time

name: Eileen M. Terry
text: Dr. Kyle was excellent, he explained my situation in detail, and even drew me a detailed diagram of what I had done to my foot. He then gave me the choices of treatment or surgery, saying that treatment would be the best and easier choice now.

name: David Light
text: Very nice doctor. Painless cortisone injections! thanks

text: Dr. Stanford is very knowledgeable and answered all of my questions.  Highly recommend TOC Athens.

name: B Carter
text: Excellent and friendly assistance.  Dr. was knowledgeable and helpful.  Nice to know Athens, AL has a first rate care facility

name: Linda Carathers
text: He is always patient. listens and great.

name: Barbara Mahan
text: I was first seen by Dr. Hunter Boyett, who scheduled me for an MRI on February 22, 2021.  The next day I called to get an appt. to get the results of my MRI appt. and was informed that Dr. Hunter Boyet would be out of the office till March 15th.  I was very upset by this because had I known I had to wait 3 weeks for an appt. and hopefully a path to relieving my pain, I would’ve gone somewhere else to another doctor.  I called and asked them if I could see another doctor in the interim and was told no, only Hunter Boyett could read me the results and prescribe anything I may need.  I will never go back there,  it made me feel like my needs were not important, and that waiting 3 weeks in a lot of pain was just the breaks.  I have had many good experiences with other orthopedic doctors in the area, this was a very bad experience and I do not recommend Athens TOC.  I am from another state and had this happened in my previous state they would not be in practice very long.  Professionals should act professional and treat their patients likewise.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear about your experience. Please call us at 256-233-2332.

name: Emily Hand
text:
The appointment was for me, Joseph Hand, not my wife.  Dr Laurence and his staff of PAs and RNs are prompt, professional, caring, friendly and very
patient.  I got a "steroid" shot in my shoulder and discussed further treatment options - they took the time to talk to me in detail.  WELL DONE!

name: Nikita Coleman Nance
text: This doctor is the absolute best. You can tell he care for his patients. I’m blessed to have him as a doctor.

name: S Terry
text: This was my first visit. They are very professional and Dr. Kyle was very informative and took the time to answer all my questions.

name: LInda Templeman
text: I was so impressed with the Orthopetic Center and especially Dr. Stanford. I'm older and he was patient with me and made sure l understood my diagnosis and treatment.

name: luis saavedra
text: The Doctor William Lawrence is a very good professional, he provides solutions,  as a person is very friendly. I recommend him

name: Maleah Eaves
text: I had a procedure done. I was supposed to get a call to schedule physical therapy and a follow up appointment. I have not got a call back and it has been around 2 months. And yes, I have tried calling. Every time I call I am on hold and then I get hung up on. I also had to go to the emergency room because I called the toc twice and had no answer. Definitely do not recommend!!

name: Eric Kelley
text: Dr. Stanford and staff are top notch, friendly and just all around awesome.

name: derrick gargis
text: We absolutely love Dr. Kyle. He's done two surgeries on my son, and we would recommend him to anybody.

name: Kala Bean
text:
Update: I was able to get an by the doctor. It was a much different experience at the Huntsville clinic than the Madison office.

Long wait, crowded waiting room during a pandemic at the Madison office. My appointment took 2 hours for a few x-rays and to be told I need an MRI after a 1 min exam. I got my MRI and rescheduled my follow-up and was not told that my follow up was at a different facility than the one I initially visited, resulting in me being marked as a no call no show. Also, my follow-up appointment was scheduled at 7:15 am, which was no problem, but when I called to try to figure out why I couldn't get into the building, no one answered at either facility I called. Very disappointing.

name: Blair Noel
text: Showed up 15 mins before my 945 appointment. I filled out kiosk sat down waited its now 1025 and the girl hands me more papers to fill out. They should have handed this to me while I had been sitting for 30 mins. I don't have extra time to be wasting I needed to go to work so I left. I just need my ankle to be checked out its over a month and still have not seen a doctor for it.

name: jessica holland
text: Toc is a very good clinic they care about their patients when i went their they got right on the problem whatever was wrong with my knee its the best bone and joint clinic and Dr.Lawrence is so nice i remcommned this clinic too anyone

name: LeeAnn Reed
text: This experience was great.  All these doctors are great people and professionals.

name: Stacey Dunn
text: Edited review. I still say the wait was too long for my first two appts (2-3 hours past appt time is a tad ridiculous).  I’m letting that slide though since Dr Boyett 100% fixed me!  I’ve been in pain for 3 years. He performed a laminotomy and discectomy. I woke up and the pain was immediately gone and hasn’t returned. I guess you wait longer when you are seeing a magician. I def would have gone a long time ago if I had known.

name: Anita Rice
text: My favorite doc!  Always smiling and so caring.

name: Linda Haggermaker
text: Dr. Lawrence and the staff at TOC in Athens are great! They are very helpful and care about their patients!

name: Deborah Sweeney
text: I am very happy with your building. I did not wait to long to get in to see the doctor.

name: Doug Nelson
text: Excellent doctor and excellent staff. Could not be more satisfied with the whole process. We were treated as nice and professional as any place we have ever been! We would highly recommend Dr. Stanford and the staff to anyone who needs their services!

name: Wendy Hollander
text: He took time to listen to my concerns.

name: Terrell Swindall
text: Got an appointment quickly.  Staff and doctor experience was great.  The only recommendation to make things better is to link the online registration profile information that is entered at home to the kiosk database.  For example, I had updated my insurance information online, but it was not reflected at the kiosk upon check-in.  Other than that, good job.

name: Dane Doerflinger
text: Very efficient, Great manners, very thorough

name: Hope Kirby
text: Dr. Stanford started helping me fix my knee about 6 or 7 months ago. He got me through a surgery and did an amazing job of it. Unfortunately my knee is in pretty bad shape and we are headed to a total knee replacement. He is doing everything he can to extend the time to keep me from having this surgery right now. He has the best bed side manner of any Dr I have ever used before and he really listens to everything I have to say. He is so sweet to me and gentle with my knee. I know a total knee replacement is in my near future but I know with him taking care of it I will make it through. He is an amazing dr. I won't use anyone else if i can help it. He walks me through everything every step of the way and he calms me before a surgery. It's a relief to know if I'm having a surgery that it's him behind the mask. He is everything a Dr should strive to be. We love Dr Stanford! He works miracles.

name: Lorinda Spencer
text: Dr Hatfield and Dr Stanford are excellent doctors and TOC Athens provides exceptional care. Their staff is friendly from the receptionist to the doctors. They are attentive and I would recommend them to everyone.

name: dawn calder
text: Dr. Hatfield and his staff are amazing. He expresses concern and listens to you. The staff are so professional and show such kindness. The first day I saw him and had a broken foot I was in tears because my son was getting married September 30. Dr. Hatfield reassured me he would take care of me and do all he could to help in the recovery phase. He also helped me to avoid surgery by continuing with a cast for 10 weeks. Yes, it was a long time being in the cast but I avoided surgery and will make it to my son's wedding. If I should ever need an orthopedic again I will return to him. Wonderful experience!

name: Dustin Bates
text: Highly recommended.  Knowledgeable, friendly, detailed, patient and fast.  Explained everything in great detail.  Same day cast.  In and out in about 1hr.  On time and efficient.  Very friendly staff.

name: Diana Isom
text:
They’re great. I had right knee surgery last year with Dr.Boyett and he was great!
Now next Thursday I got to have surgery on my left.
They’re very nice and professional people!

name: Paige Conway
text: I highly recommend Doctor Stanford. He did a great job with my ankle surgery. He is a kind person. He is professional but one can tell that he cares about his patients. He is never in a rush, as so many doctors often convey that they are hurried.  The Physical Therapy group that is rehabilitating patients is on the same floor as his office. They are also excellent.

name: Lynne Moseley
text:
Well managed practice - I was seen within 5 minute of my appointment times every time I was there.  All staff are very friendly and helpful.

I have had 2 surgical procedures (back and knee) with 2 different doctors and have absolutely had pleasant experiences both times.

This is a class act practice

name: Andy George
text: Great staff, doctors and facilities.

name: BAMAJ
text: Love Dr. Lawrence and staff. From the time I checked  in until I left , I was treated with kindness and respect. Whatever the reason, I never felt that my issue was considered less of a problem than someone else. I highly recommend TOC for all of your orthopedic needs.

name: martha jones
text: Perfect!! Did exactly what I needed! Couldn't have even one complaint! You people know your stuff and know how to solve the problem!! Very happy not to hurt ANY MORE!! THANKS SO VERY MUCH!! 😁

name: Tamara Gardner
text: I am very happy with the care I have received from Dr Eric Stanford.  He is very professional and has an awesome bed side personality! I would definitely recommend The Orthopedic Center and Dr Eric Standard.

name: Kim Chaney
text: From Kim Cantrell Chaney: Dr Boyett and his staff are patient, thoughtful, and caring. They take their time to answer all of my questions and concerns. I would highly recommend him.

name: Anna Perry
text: I have to say Dr.Standford is the best dr I have ever seen. The best bedside manner.  Don't stop ti he gets to the bottom of the problem.  Thanks for your help

name: Sheila Jackson
text: This place was awesome.Everyone help me when needed.Appt.set up quickly. Knowledgement of their jobs. This place knows what they're doing and they are very experienced a polite.I would be glad to go back.

name: Billy Ward
text: Today was my first visit. I was extremely  impressed with Dr. Lawrence and all of the our staff member. I would highly recommend this clinic my friends and family.

name: BB2 Beauty & The Beast
text: The doctor and staff showed empathy about my illness and this was the first time I have been made to feel this way out of all the doctors who treated me at other locations.  I was traumatized and the doctor and staff showed compassion and provided me with a wonderful platform towards rehabilitation.  I couldn't see the light at the end of the tunnel but with their guidance I have made progress and for that I want to say thank you and may God bless you all.

name: Stephanie Allen
text: A nice, new facility. Plenty of parking. I was taken on time. Dr. Hatfield was kind and knowledgeable. He listened and asked if I had any questions.

name: Pamela Baldo
text: Very informative and friendly

name: Tye Pickett
text: The whole experience was unlike any other surgery I've ever had this staff is in a class above the rest I felt like there care was genuine and not just to make you just another number or just another surgery under there belt to get paid for they really care about getting me better and they listen to you instead of just telling you what they want you to do. Only problem I have with the staff is they really could have warned me that I might wake up with a catheter still in that was a experience I'll remember as long as i live LOL I will refer all my family and friends to TOC in Athens without hesitation. I really love my doctor he is really down to earth and doesn't seem to act like he is above you because he is a surgeon he has a real humbling attitude about him. He told me from day one not to worry that he got me I'm in good hands I truly believe that now. Keep up the great work guys

name: Beverly Criddle
text: Nice dr

name: Stephen Gleim
text: TOC services is top notch. The staff is courtesy, professional, and friendly!! Doctor Stanford is highly rated and very caring towards his patients. I highly recommend Doctor Stanford's services!!

name: Phyllis Fournier
text: Everyone was very friendly and attentive.I didn't have to wait very long at all to be seen.Dr Standford ask questions and listen to my concerns.

name: Sue Martin
text: Dr. Stanford was absolutely amazing with my son's ankle surgery. Will definitely see him again if ever need too.

name: Kristi Jones
text: Dr Lawrence is a professional doctor and good at his job with a very nice and friendly personality. I would recommend him to anyone!

name: Jennifer Stovall
text: Dr. Lawrence was amazing and the staff was very professional. I never wait very long to actually see the doctor which is great. Usually in and out within an hour depending on what’s being done that visit

name: Cheryl Lewter
text: Love the entire staff at TOC! Thanks to Dr. Stanford for making my daughter comfortable.

name: Charles Brock
text: I have been dealing with the TOC for years starting with Dr Greco, Clark and now Blake Boyette. Their the best, they care, listen and treat you like a person now a cash cow.  I recommend them every time I come in contact with anyone needing orthopedic care. I look forward to starting the last leg of this back surgery the PT. Dr. being and ole country boy from Marion and Lamar county sure helped

name: Lindsey Keith
text: They are very professional yet welcoming. I was seen in a timely manner and the nurses and doctor took very good care of me

name: James Couch
text: The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and doctor Stanford was professional,  knowledgeable,  courteous and very helpful.  I would recommend to anyone.

name: Chrissy B
text: Dr. Stanford is by far the BEST orthopedic surgeon I have seen. I would recommend him to anyone. He is the first doctor who actually said there was something wrong with my knee, and he fixed it. It is healing up amazing and he is very great with keeping up with my progress. Please, if you need an Ortho consult, he is the man to go see!

name: Glenda David
text: Love Dr. Stanford and the staff at TOC, would not want to go anywhere else!

name: Tina Millard
text: Where other doctors had played down my pain and wanted me to wait for years for the knee replacement surgery this doctor didn't. He knew there was no way I would make it 3 more years with the pain I was in or all of the shots I had had. It was a relief to see that someone cared to make a difference in the wellness of my life.

name: Kay Coulter
text: Everytime that I go to TOC, the staff and doctor's are always nice and caring.

name: Marqueda Whipple
text: Relief very quickly. Going back to get my neck and shoulders. Thank you, Mr. Stanford and staff.

name: Madeline Torres

text: Dr. Lawrence and Dr. Boyett are the best Orthopedics around. I have met several patients of theirs and they both have been highly praised. They have wisely selected their staff; who as well work very hard and also make sure the patients are properly taken care of. A great team!

name: Wade Shannon

name: Connie Mills

name: Alan Lieb
text: I would have say their service and bed side manners are above the norm for Alabama. I being a disabled American vet, this speaks volumes compared to how I have been treated at other places.

name: Michael Sellers

Love these guys!!! Dr Boyett did my knee  surgery and Dr Lawerance just did a hip surgery on my GMama! We love them both!!

text: We did on line check in.  My husband was called back very quickly after we arrived. Liked Dr Hubley very much.  They also got us in same day called.  Both of my husbands experiences have been very good.  Would recommend them highly!

name: Jonathan Caldwell
text: Dr. Hubley and his staff took great care of me! He gave a detailed explanation of what was going on and the path we needed to fix my issue.

name: David Bagley
text: As usual my visit with dr Hubley was a success.  He always takes the time to explain what he sees and how to get well.

name: Dee Reed
text: I like going here. Dr Hubley is friendly and always professional. He has a great personality and takes the time needed with you. I’m always in and out there in less then 30 minutes. I highly recommend.

name: Michelle Houston
text: I've been going to Dr.Hubley on and off for about 3yrs.He has been an excellent doctor.He has a very professional mannerism and addresses all of my concerns and help me to understand exactly the issues that surrounds my aliments and subscribe the necessary treatments. look no further,he is the best

name: alison ramires
text: Dr. Hubley is a great doctor. He listens and in my case he has not only performed surgery for a bone spur in my shoulder with great results  Dr. Hubley treated me recently for that plantar fasciitis with exercise and an anti-inflammatory . I can't think of ever going to another doctor or office.

name: Selisa Helvacioglu
text: Wonderful office from the phone call to schedule the fast appointment to the check out . Ellen Thompson, RN,  is stunning and knowledgeable and a perfect asset to Dr. Hubley. Dr Hubley has been caring for me and my family for over 20 years- with our sports adventures and mishaps to my newborn grandsons hip issues, Dr Hubley has always been there for us!

resp.text: We value your feedback and want to thank you for taking the time to share it.  We'll certainly pass along the kind words to Ellen!

name: Michelle Frank
text: From check in to check out Dr Hubley and his staff were top notch!  Went above and beyond to make me comfortable and addressed all of my needs and concerns. Thank you !

name: Chris Patterson
text: Very nice man. Appointment was quick and informative. Highly recommend.

name: Elaine Wood
text: Doctor Hubleyis a wonderful doctor.  On time with my appointment.  X-rays were taken and treatment administered.  I recommend this place.

name: Debra Murphy
text: I had a total hip replacement 4 years ago by Dr. Hubley. I continued to have pain. The implant wasn’t seated right and had fibrous tissue between the bone and implant which is very painful. I ended up at Andrews Institute to attempt a revision, the first failed due to the lack of bone left, I am scheduled in October for another attempt. Four years of continued pain praying this doctor can correct this and relieve some of my pain.

name: Tina
text: Quick and gives you options. Dr. Huntley was generous to share info about cheaper options for me while considering my insurance coverage. His by Dre is great as well. I appreciate their quickness. Time is valuable.

name: Melinda Shaw
text: This was the first visit with Doctor Hubley.Due to Covid-19, we filled out our paperwork online and waited briefly in the car until we were called. Although I did not see any of the staff wearing masks, they did offer to provide a mask for my mother. Including exrays it only took around 30 minutes from start to finish as he said no treatment was necessary for her elbow bursitis. He answered all our questions and was very friendly. We appreciated how promptly we saw him and that we were able to get an appointment within a day.

resp.text: Thanks for taking time to share your experience, Melinda!  We work hard to get patients in quickly....and make visits as efficient as possible.  Thanks again for the positive feedback.

name: Joseph Stinson
text: Dr. Hubley and the whole staff were great. Two thumbs up.

name: Melissa Long
text: I started with him 23 years ago with my daughter. He was so diligent and caring I stayed with him. He put my arm back together 12 years ago and now with a torn ACL. I trust him to take care of this physical body!  Thanks Doc, I really appreciate you!!! Th our the BEST!

name: susan peacock
text: Always very concerned and willing to help you!Dr Hubley and Ellen Rock!!!!

name: diane mauldin
text: My visit today w/Dr. Hubley was very professional but caring. He was concerned at all times of my comfort. I appreciate all good doctors in Foley cause I go to lots of them. Thanks, Diane Mauldin

name: Max Lake
text:
Staff was friendly and caring. Was surprised that the X-ray tech questioned me about my ankle to determine what films to take before I saw the physician.
Not sure weather you reviewed my history before you came into the room. You wanted to prescribe me Celebrex and I had stated that I was allergic to it, causes ulcers in my mouth.
One of the issues I am experiencing is while walking in the boot and (I do have a sneaker on the other foot) it irritates my lower back and left leg.

name: john anlage
text: The most professional medical institution I gave ever experienced.......they know what service and being punctual is....   Dr Hubley is as good as there is......he is considerate and honest and communicates well

name: Keri Siler
text: Explained about my finger, told me my options and showed me the x-ray. I felt informed and my concerns were addressed, and i was able to make a informed decision that was best for me, Even had a nice sense of humor, did not feel like i was rushed in and out.

name: Jody Frilot
text: Dr. Hubley is a fantastic Dr.  He and his staff are top notch.  And super fast.  I highly recommend him with gold stars.

name: Lorri Nichols
text: I took my son to see Dr Hubley while we were on vacation in orange beach. His shoulder has been bothering him all baseball season. They got us in same day and after 30 minute wait, my son was able to get an X-ray and be seen and diagnosed immediately.  I work in an orthopaedic hospital, so I know what a typical wait for this kind of thing is - not usually immediate!   Dr Hubley and his staff were kind, courteous and knowledgeable.  I highly recommend their clinic!

name: Michele Hayes
text: Dr Hubley was very knowledgeable, personal and professional. He was thorough and took the time to really address my issue. I would highly recommend him. He was wonderful!

name: Robert Gibson
text: Experience with Dr. Hubley at Baldwin Bone and Joint was excellent.  Processed quickly, pictured quickly, seen quickly, but not rushed. All my questions were answered. Diagnosis, explanation, and planned treatment all passed muster. I am not an easy customer. Highly recommend.

name: Mike Kelley
text: Very professional and  personable. Diagnosed my problem quickly.and was in and out in 30minutes. Would highly recommend Baldwin bone and Joint and Dr. Hubley. .

name: Lisa Davison
text: Very friendly staff. Dr. Hubley is a very personable dr., very knowledgeable and explains your medical needs thoroughly.  Fast appointments when needed. Fast scheduling on test. Would recommend him to family members and friends.

name: Chris McAlexander
text: Really takes time to listen. Does not rush you.  Explains in plain English what is the problem and what his plan is for resolution.  Would recommend to a friend.

name: Bobby Brown
text:
We are fortunate to have Dr. Hubley in the area!!
I went in yesterday miserable hip pain. After his treatment, I am 99% better today. He and his nurse Ellen are very empathetic and they go above and beyond for their patients. You can tell they went into medicine for the right reasons!!

name: Rhonda Mcreynolds
text: Dr.Hubley is a good doctor and this was my daughter first time there. The only thing we didn't like is people was getting call to the back that came in after us and in fact we was the last patient in the waiting room.

name: Brian Biggs
text: Dr. Hubley has treated me for several years now. Very professional & knowledgeable. I would highly recommended him & his staff!

name: Gwendolyn Layton
text: Dr.  Hubley was very knowledgeable in all aspects of my injury.  He explained my treatment and what to expect as far as the healing process.  I would highly recommend Baldwin Bone and Joint.

name: Dr. Elaine Woodhouse
text: My first time visiting was a wonderful experience the staff was extremely wonderful ,very nice and my first time very nice  The setting and the atmosphere was very comfortable , Dr. Hubley, was also very nice. He explained my condition,very clearly, and I was very  satisfied with their services .

name: Thomas Ausborn
text: Dr. Hubley is the rudest, most pompous medical "professional" I have ever had the distinct displeasure of meeting. He misdiagnosed my lower back injury and said no one will go against my medical opinion so don't bother getting a second opinion. Well I did get a second opinion, and guess what? Yep, they recognized the problem instantly and I finally received the treatment I needed. Dr. Hubley's incompetence caused me nearly two months of needless intolerable pain and loss of work.

name: Christopher Atwood
text: Talks like a real person. Nurse was easy to contact after appointment. All questions answered.

name: john thiem

text: I went to Bone and Joint for the first time yesterday. The receptionist was very polite and respectful. They all had smiles on there faces. I saw doctor Hubley he and his nurse we're very nice. His nurse explained everything to me and once doctor Hubley came in and saw me he listened to everything that I had to say. I told him what was going on with me and checked me out and done an x-ray on me and he explained to me what the x-ray showed up. So all and all my experience there was great.

Thank you for taking care of me  🙏👍🏼😊

text: I worked home health for 6 years in Baldwin County, such a caring Doctor. When ny husband tore his labrum, he seen Dr. Hubley and my husband thought he was wonderful. He explained to him in detail every x-ray and everything he did! Nice man and he is wonderful to his patients!

name: Bernie Eaton

I definitely recommend him if you need a good orthopedic surgeon.

I had a car accident and another doctor told me i was not going to walk normal ever again but doctor leberte probe him wrong and give me a new hip and now im walking better than before and my leg is straight and he cares for the patient he works for every patient recovery and i can personally said i trust on him 101% with my eyes closed. He and his staff they care for you from day one and he will do what is best for the patient and guide you towards your recovery. Thanks Dr. Leberte for the best care and for to give me a new right Hip. God bless you.

name: Evelyn Bates
text: He is a God send we need 100 more like him I know he is just doing his job but his bedside manner and respect for how you feel are the best thank you Dr leberte I don't think I would have had a better experience with a different dr.and his wonderful staff may I please mention Rebecca she went above and beyond . Thanks to the entire staff at TOC

name: Don Buchanan
text: Dr. Ledbetter is very professional and his recommendations for treatment to my shoulder are very helpful.  Thanks!!

name: Terri Walker
text: Dr LeBerte and his staff are absolutely wonderful! I have had several procedures and a torn meniscus surgery. Every time I have encountered Dr LeBerte or his staff, they are the kindest people you could ever meet.

name: Freddy Baskins
text: Dr. Leberte keeps me going with the shots in the shoulder.

name: Larry Satterfield
text: I had a total right hip replacement in October 2019 and I am doing great thanks to Dr Leberte and his team at the TOC.

name: michael eason
text: I love how everyone is so nice and helpful.

name: Canisius Newsome
text: I absolutely love Dr. Leberte! He is one of the most loving and caring doctor I’ve ever had. I love his staff. Everyone is so encouraging and nice.

name: John Winston
text: Dr. Leberte and all his staff have been wonderful in caring for my wife after a fall that broke her hip and arm. Take the time to answer all our questions and do not feel rushed.

name: Linda Graviett
text:
Dr. LeBerte is the most professional, caring Dr. I have ever known.  The BEST  Orthopedic Doctor!  100%
Also his staff is  very nice.

name: L Fontenot
text: Dr. Leberte is a VERY Kind, and knowledgeable Man!

name: Jay Brazelton
text:
Very Very thorough, Did a Great Job Replacing Both of My knees ,
I did the Right in May of 2018 Then the Left in October of 2018.
The cause was from racing Dirt Bikes in my early years.
I am Out Of Pain Finally!

name: Janoi Cabrera
text: Friendly, professional and knowledgeable

name: Alfrie Healey
text: Dr. Leberte listens carefully to my concerns and complaints.  I participated in the final analysis.  I have several other medical problems and we arrived at a mutual decision about my present orthopedic problems . Highly satisfied with my visit.

name: Bettye Evans
text: Dr. Leberte, is an excellent surgeon and his bedside manner is outstanding. I got the answers I needed and the help I needed. A great man.

name: Mark Higginson
text: expert in his field

name: Susan Stewart
text:
2021 Uodate: I went back to Dr.  Leberte for my one year checkup. Everything I said last year is still true except this year it took 55 minutes past my appt time to walk out so that’s still outstanding for any doctor, especially a specialist.  He is working with me to postpone knee replacement as long as possible and is so understanding and supportive of my goal.
2020 post:
He was knowledgeable and compassionate and discussed my issue thoroughly.  He answered all my questions and gave advice and arranged follow up.  I can’t say enough good things about him.   And a big plus today was getting completely done and out 35 minutes past my appt time!  Unheard of!  I don’t expect that ever again but it was nice.

name: Judy Crown
text: This doc is the best! Saw him today - every visit is helpful!

name: Donna McKnight
text: Dr. Leberte and his staff are very professional.   His x ray personal are highly trained u don't have to wait forever to get seen for x-rays. Dr Leberte is up to date with the latest surgery's and will listen to you and explain what he can do to fix the problem. They return phone calls an schedule apt right then. This will be my 2nd time using him. Great bed side manner.

name: Sandy Fuller
text: great dr

name: Winchester Jude
text: Dr. Leberte is one of the most caring doctors I've been fortunate enough to have care for my orthopedic issues since I've been in Huntsville over the last 5 years. He listens and   is not opposed to considering my personal opinions about treatment. He has treated my "clunking" knee with orthovisc injections (which I described as a lube job) at my request; and, he and his staff went above and beyond to get permission from my insurance company for the three injections series rather than a newer single injection because I have found in the past this works best for me. Thank you Dr. Lebert and staff!

name: Billy Boozer
text: Staff was friendly, efficient, through. Very pleased with treatment!

name: James McDaniel
text:
Dr Leberte explained to me what to expect from a TKR, and he answered all my questions. He came to my room the following morning to see how I was recovering. Great bedside manners and very personable. My return visit after 2 weeks, Dr Leberte removed the sterile-strips and released me to take showers. My incision has all closed and no seepage. I have PT to do, but after about 10 days, I was walking without assistance of a walker or cane. I know this is not the norm for a TKR, I'm very fortunate for that. Lots of prayers before, during and after surgery helped tremendously.
I would highly recommend Dr Leberte for a TKR.

name: Ashlee Grove
text: Excellent care, professional, and caring bedside manner. Elicited trust and compassion.

name: Jesse Barber
text: Excellent doctor that leaves no stone unturned to discover the root cause of the problem!

name: Frank Sargeant
text: Intelligent, to the point and very helpful in possible solutions to a continuing hip joint problem

name: Barbara Archey
text: Dr. Leberte was always willing to answer questions and take the time needed for the patient. He has a good bedside manner

name: Shelley Merrill
text: Dr. Leberte and his staff are fabulous! They are caring and professional! Highly recommend them!

name: Harold Samuels
text: excellent doctor and one of the best people you would ever want

name: Eric Thompson
text: Dr. Leberte and his staff were very friendly and took the time to show me the details of my injury and explain treatment options.

name: Mark Hasemeyer
text:
Dr. Leberte fixed my right collar bone after a motorcycle accident. He did a great job and was very personable when I went in for follow ups.

I'd highly recommend seeing him.

name: mike apsl
text: Very professional in making decisions

name: Elisabeth Owen
text: Wonderful, caring physician. Terrific bedside manner. Great staff.

name: Patty Henritze
text: Great

name: Ashley Steelman
text: He has been amazing ! I'm very thankful for him and his compassion! Would highly recommend him!

name: edward guevara
text: I went to see him for severe pain in my shoulder. He gave me a very quick exam and gave me a steroid shot in my shoulder. Then while he was in the process of giving me the shot, he informed me that it will hurt more than it already did after he injected it. I asked him to give me something for the pain at night. He refused! I had just taken a steroid pack for eczema the month before, so he did nothing besides the shot! I have one kidney and kidney problems so I am very careful what I take. I am not allowed ANY anti-inflammatories bc of my kidney. He could've  checked everything, I rarely use medication at all, but these doctors don't really care about the patient individually. If you have any serious pain, save yourself the aggrevation and go to someone else!!! He made me feel like a drug addict just bc I asked him to give me pain medication for night time when it is at it's worse, or at least give me some sort of alternative!

name: Joe Tillman
text: Lost the end of my index finger in June. Dr. Leberte did surgery to repair my finger. Was unable to reattach the end due to severe damage. He did a wonderful repair on my finger and it actually looks very good. Great surgeon with a great personality! Office visits were pleasant and fairly quick! I recommend Dr. Leberte

name: Houston Hammac
text: Great surgeon, wonderful bedside manner. I was really scared when I found out that my left hip popped out of socket and fractured. Dr. Leberte and my admitting phycision made me more comforatable.

name: Ken Howe
text: Dr. Smith has performed four surgeries on my hands over the past two years. Two carpal tunnel surgeries, one to remove gout related deposits and one To repair a finger which I seriously injured in a saw mishap. Thanks to his skills and a very capable staff I have had fantastic results. I would highly recommend him to anyone in need of hand surgery. Thank you Dr Smith and your great staff!

name: Milton Smith
text: Dr. Smith and his staff are precise and meticulous with their diagnoses. He and the staff were courteous, and  kind in their attitudes toward me. His work has allowed me to be pain free with a very troubling problem.

name: K Brown
text:
I highly recommend Dr. Smith.  He took excellent care of my mother after she fell and required surgery.  He was very patient and kind and thorough with us and answered all our questions.
I went back to him for 2 elective hand surgeries and was very pleased with his care.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! Dr. Smith is definitely the best, and we'll pass along your feedback so he knows how great of a job he did. We'll always be ready to provide you with the highest level of service whenever you or your family require orthopaedic expertise.

name: Cindy Thompson
text: Dr. Smith was a wonderful doctor. He did surgery on my thumb and did a great job. I would recommend him if you need a good surgeon. He was very nice and sweet and he set down and talked to me and let me ask questions if I needed to. Just a great doctor. I would definitely go back to him.

resp.text: We appreciate the review, Cindy! We're always happy to hear when we've accomplished our mission of providing 5-star care & service in our clinic.

name: Peggy Morris
text: Dr. Smith is a wonderful, caring doctor.  He diagnosed the issue with my hand, on first visit, and performed surgery. I’m pain-free and able to use it for the first time in months. The staff at Southlake Orthopedics has always been first rate and our family would go no where else for Ortho issues.

resp.text: So thrilled to hear about your experience, Peggy! And we're sure Dr. Smith and the rest of his staff will be excited to hear as well. We're lucky to have such a skilled and experienced surgeon as Dr. Smith as a part of the team.

name: Cindy Benson
text: Dr Smith did Carpal Tunnel Release surgery on my hand.  Excellent outcome.  Excellent surgeon and staff.  I highly recommend him.

name: Audrey Day
text: I am very pleased with the results of my carpal tunnel release surgery performed by doctor Smith. The whole process went smoothly from start to finish.

name: Keith Tolbert
text: I have the upmost confidence in Dr. Smith.  His background consists of prestigious schools and medical centers and he is very knowledgeable in this field. I also have great respect for Dr. Smith and and his staff.  I was very pleased with the results of my wrist after surgery and wouldn’t hesitate going back if I needed anything else.  A great man....a great doctor!!!!!!!  Thank you and God bless each one of you, Keith Tolbert

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Keith! We're so happy that you had a wonderful experience. We'll be sure to share this with Dr. Smith and the rest of the team so they know what a wonderful job they did.

name: Donna McCully
text: Great doctor as well as great staff. Wonderful surgical outcome...would highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Donna! Very happy to hear about your experience, and we'll be sure Dr. Smith and the team know what a great job they did.

name: cathy martin
text: Dr. Smith performed surgery on my hand/wrist to relieve pain.  He tried other options first, which I appreciated. I would highly recommend him for your Orthopaedic needs.

resp.text: We appreciate the review, Cathy! We always aim to approach treatment with a surgery-last approach, but when the situation calls for it, we know we can trust the incredible expertise of Dr. Smith.

name: Tina Rinehart
text: Dr. Smith is a great doctor. He explains everything to you in a way that you understand what is going on. Him and his staff take every precaution to keep you safe as well. My mom can use her wrist/hand again now. He told her it would take 3 months after surgery and it took her 3 months just like he said. You could not ask for a better doctor and we highly recommend  him to anyone that needs an orthopedic  for their hand /wrist.  Also want to brag on their physical therapy department ladies Cathy and  Rebekah both are awesome and know their stuff.

name: Joey Lawhorn
text: A very good experience. Highly recommend Dr Smith and his entire staff.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Joey! We'll be sure to pass along your praises to the whole team. Thanks again for choosing us.

name: mickfinn4u
text:
Dr Smith ,PA and staff took great care of me and went beyond my expectations.I've been going to Southlake since 1987 and have always been well taken care of.
A+ Thanks

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Mick! Love to hear about a job well-done, but it's even better when we hear we have consistently done a great job!

name: Vicki Smith
text: There is no better surgeon than Dr. Smith.  As painful as the injury was, and the recovery physical therapy, the care was the best ever.  I've had other orthopedic surgeries in several different cities, but the professionalism of the staff is balanced with the genuine concern and care of the entire staff.  Love Dr. Smith, he's the best!

name: Otis Smith
text:
Dr. Smith reconstructed my finger after a table saw accident.  Would have never believed that the finger would have ever looked normal again, little lone functional.
His talent as a surgeon is far and above anything I have ever seen in my 60 years.
An honest, direct, extremely dedicated professional that I have highly recommend to everyone I meet in need of hand surgery.

name: Susan Hulsey
text: I stabbed my hand with a knife cutting an avocado.  Dr. Smith repaired the artery and the nerve in the palm of my hand.  I have regained strength in my hand and sensation in my fingers! I would recommend him to anyone for his knowledge, skill and expertise.  By the way, he is also nice!

name: DAVID V
text: This is the second time I used Dr. Smith for surgery - once on my wrist and once on my hand. He is an outstanding doctor from all aspects and expectations. Of all the 11 doctors that I currently using, he has the best technical skills and follow up after the surgery. Just as important, he has great people skills. He honestly cares about his patients and assures that the patient understands all options, all plans for treatment, and a clear path for recovery.  He is a very nice, caring and down to earth gentleman. I STRONGLY recommend Dr. Smith and the staff at Southlake Orthopaedics.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the feedback!

name: Sheila Marcus
text: Best hand doctor I know

resp.text: Thanks for the high praise, Sheila! We appreciate you choosing our clinic, and we'll be ready to serve again should you or your family ever require orthopaedic services in the future.

name: Dianne Snow
text: Dr. Smith and his staff are absolutely fantastic in every aspect. They meet with you on a personal level making you feel comfortable and at ease. The day of my surgery was a never before experienced event; no sitting and waiting forever - I was taken back almost immediately after arriving, prepared for surgery, saw my husband, taken back and the next thing I knew I was waking up. If surgery could be an enjoyable experience, this one was. Follow up visits have been equally impressive. It’s a joy to deal with professionals of this caliber.

name: Margaret Harrill
text: I fell & broke my wrist at the beginning of the Covid-19 pandemic. Dr. Smith "screwed" me back together with complete success! I was very impressed with the safety precautions practiced at both the outpatient surgery center & the Grandview office. My compliments not only to Dr. Smith for his care but for his team as well, Caroline his PA & Leslie PT. All couldn't have been kinder or more encouraging. In an emergency like mine you just take your chances with the surgeon available & willing to take you on.  With Dr. Smith I won the lottery!

name: Mary Belle Van Der Noord
text: Wonderful experience from beginning to end; I had been suffering from sharp joint pain in my left wrist and thumb that interfered with daily activities as well as my sleep. I am so grateful to Dr. Smith and his team of medical professionals for giving me my hand back!!

name: Sherri Magness
text: Dr. Smith and his entire staff have been wonderful to work with from the beginning consultation to the post op meetings!  Dr. Smith and his assistant, Caroline, are both very caring and knowledgeable. I could not have asked for a better team to take care of my hand (carpal tunnel).  They answered questions before I even knew I had them!  My surgery went well and recovery has been better than anticipated!  Thank you, Dr. Smith and Staff for helping me with this and getting me back to my new normal!

name: Stanley Woodall
text: Dr. Smith did an outstanding job with my carpal tunnel surgery and has great bedside manner.

name: Zada Edwards
text:
I'm very pleased with the kindness and support from the entire staff at Southlake Orthopaedic. Dr. Smith is absolutely fabulous!  He's one of the most understanding, kind and sensitive doctors you'll ever meet! Dr Smith will take the time to explain and listen to any concerns you may have.
Everything from my surgery to my follow up appointments have been superior. If you need to see a Orthopaedic Surgeon go see this guy! He's awesome!
Zada Edwards

resp.text: Thank you so much for the feedback.  Patient satisfaction is so important to my team at Southlake Orthopaedics!

name: Brenda Stevenson
text: Very pleased with my care and Dr Smith’s expertise.

name: Leslie Holliday
text: Dr. Smith and his staff are professional, kind and helpful. I have used their office for two surgeries and have been more than pleased with the care I received.

name: Kimberly Rudd
text: I am very pleased with the advise, recommendations and surgical work that Dr. Michael Smith and his staff provided. I was extremely surprised and happy to see that HE personally called to check on me the night of my surgery. Usually doctors don't do that themselves. If I need Orthopaedic Hand, shoulder or finger work again, I would go back to his office!

name: MOMMA WEBB
text: Love Dr Smit he always has a smile awesome as a surgeon did great on both of my surgery, I will recommend him to any one.  And he is not bad to look at LOL

resp.text: Thank for the feedback!

name: Leah Pennington
text: Dr. Smith is absolutely wonderful.  He made me feel very comfortable and explained everything to me as soon as possible.  His staff was very welcoming and helpful with any questions or concerns that I had.   I'm incredibly grateful for everything.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback. Our goal is to provide quality patient care to all our patients.

name: Saundra Ivey
text: All of my visits with Dr. Smith and the entire staff have been pleasant, efficient and trust-building. I am a retired RN and it is important to me to be involved in the care plan and to be thoroughly informed. Dr. Smith does that. I would recommend him highly!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the feedback!

name: Brittanie Hinkle
text: I had a piece of metal under my fingernail and had to get it surgically removed. Dr. Smith and all the staff I dealt with were absolutely amazing. I haven’t had the best experiences with doctors in the past so it gave me a refreshed and positive perspective on the medical field. Dr. Smith even calls his patients the night of the surgery to check on you and make sure everything is going ok. He’s been a blessing!

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback!  Our goal is to provide excellent services to our patients.

name: Ken Ratliff
text: Dr Smith really cares and listens to his patients and I feel his quality of services provided are excellent.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Patricia Byrd
text: Dr. Smith is great. His surgical skills are outstanding and he always has time to answer questions. I highly recommend him as an Orthopedic doctor and surgeon.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the feedback!

name: Tommy Dew
text: Very pleased with Dr Smith and the staff. My surgery went well and I will use their services again if needed.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Melody Jones
text: Dr. Smith has provided excellent care to my 78 year father who referred for an Elbow abscess. The condition required multiple surgical irrigation and debridement. He talked my Dad through the lengthy process, explaining in detail and answering questions in a manner he understood. My Dad’s elbow is doing good, Dr. Smith continues to stay in check. My family is very grateful to Dr. Smith!

name: Diana
text: Everything was excellent from the time I got there with the receptionist straight thru all the nurses to recovery. They all were very professional & very friendly & kind.  The wait time wasn't long at all.  I'm so glad they send home with you, a what to do sheet, because you (I) can't remember whatever after my surgery.

name: MMT Gaming
text:
I have had two appointments and both times were good, positive experiences with Dr. Smith
and the Southgate staff. Dr. Smith was good at explaining my treatment and asked me if I had any questions. I would definitely go back to Dr. Smith if further treatment was needed.
D. Burkes

name: Brenda Armstrong
text: Great experience with Dr Smith and the staff. Would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the feedback!

name: Carol Gregory
text: I am very pleased with Dr. Smith and the service that I received. Very good physician,and I would recommend him to anyone.

name: Patsy Jeffcoat
text: Dr Smith treated me for shoulder pain. We tried a conservative approach first with PT, then MRI, surgery, and more PT.  I am please with each step of the process and with the results.

name: Paula Patrick
text: Professional friendly staff, on time, and Dr. Smith listened!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback.  Our goal is to provide excellent patient care!

name: John Somsel
text: Dr. Maples is a super surgeon and has excellent bedside manners. He took all the time  necessary to answer my questions regarding my recent knee replacement surgery.  This was after he spent a day in surgery and the time with me went past the normal work day time period.  I  recommend him for any knee surgery!

name: big stuf29
text: I love Dr Maples and anyone who has assisted him to fix all of my broken bones. His whole staff is great. Im not telling you to break a bone. But that is the way you can get him to fix you with exceptional bed side manner and super excellent surgery skills. I love Huntsville Hospital because of Dr Maples and his exceptional team and the care they give i could go on and on But Dr Maples you are my Guy forever love you Tanesha T.

name: C E
text: The staff were friendly and knowledgeable.  Dr. Maples took the time to listen to my issue and he answered all my questions in a caring professional manner.  He eased my mind with his knowledge of my condition.  Two thumbs up.

name: Tonya Hayes
text: Thank you Dr.Maples for all you have done for Tonya,you are very helpful & have an Amazing Team.

name: Charles Quillen
text: My wife has received great care from Dr. Maples and his team.

name: D. Richard George
text: Excellent medical care, spends adequate (not rushed) time and answers all questions.  Pleased!

name: Debra Pearce
text: Had a total knee replacement 5 weeks ago. Dr. Maples and his staff have been wonderful!  Very caring, answered all my questions, returns calls promptly.  I highly recommend him and his staff.

name: Betty Roberts
text: Quick , effecient service and obtained the information needed to make my problem easier to solve. Kind, informed Doctor and I appreciated his help.

name: Daniel Pollard
text: Some waiting but visit was a very encouraging informative post surgery session.

name: Cynthia Schonefeld
text: Dr. Maples is an outstanding surgeon... I traveled from out of town to see him and it was well worth it.. I am a nurse myself and am very cautious when choosing a doctor... He definitely exceeded my expectations... He also assured me that he would be able to help if I had any questions or troubles going forward.. He also has an outstanding staff as well! I would definitely recommend Dr. Maples and his staff... Thank you!

name: Pat Richards
text: Great doctor.  Have had nothing but good experiences.   Would definitely recommend him if you ever need knee replacement.

name: Cynthia Finney
text: Very engaging and explained options to treatments.

name: Sandra Fullenwider-Stewart
text:
I didn’t meet Dr.Maples. His PA Mason was AWESOME!!! He listened to me and explained everything in layman’s terms. Great guy.....the best bedside manner!!
Thanks Mason!!

name: John D'Arcy
text: Super quick xray and evaluation! (15 minutes)

name: Christy Peele
text: I Appreciate Mason Morris PA Taking time to listen and answer all my questions concerning the Bursa Injection! It was a Good Experience and I will be much more relaxed for the next Injection. Thank You Mason!!

name: Mark rollinson
text: Dr Maples "PA" did a fine job---I did feel my wait time in the room was a bit excessive--I sat, alone, in a stuffy room for over 25 minutes...I understand that things can be backed up---but no one checked on me for all that time...The "PA" looked at my Xray--listened to my knee problems and verified everything I was suffering from....He gave me a injection and a follow up appointment--everything I needed...

name: Steve Wood
text: Mako Robitic Knee Replacement-Amazing compared to old way...Which was great..but why not go with less recovery time, less hospital time...etc

name: Roger Graves
text: Great doctor—so caring and easy to talk to. Very thankful he is my doctor. Sara Graves

name: Clifford Mansell
text: I've had two knee surgeries this year, and one to go. Doctor Maples and his staff have performed beyond my expectations. No complaints!

name: Kelly Gardner
text: One of the best doctors!! Such a caring physician. He has a wonderful bedside manner. His staff is also awesome!!

name: Pamela Irene Clark
text: Very helpful information. Answered al questions without appearing rushed.

name: Dustin Boggs
text: Little to no wait time for scheduled appointment. Dr. Maples reviewed xrays and setup a treatment plan without hesitation. Highly recommended.

name: Michael Lynn
text: TOC is the best

name: Ryan Wilhoit
text: Quick and informative!

name: Michael K
text: Very easy getting in to see Dr Maples. He was very attentive, thoroughly reviewed results and provided options and suggestions. He was not rushed and I could discuss the options with ease. His staff are also very friendly and attentive.

name: Virginia Ellenburg
text: I am very please with Dr. Maples team!!

name: Ashley Lankford
text: My 3 year old daughter has been seeing Dr. Maples for the last 5 months for a broke finger and reattached finger nail. He is very nice and understanding with her being so small. He is very patient with her. We love all the staff also.

name: Ann Russell
text: Dr. Maples is the most caring and really listens to what you have to say.  All your concerns or questions, no matter how small they may seem, he doesn't mind answering them.  Thanks Dr. Maples.

name: Nancy Biggs
text: My Mom saw Dr. Maples for a broken wrist she injured in a nursing home. She has advanced dementia and he was extremely gentle and kind to her. Wonderful bedside manner! 💜❤️💜

name: Lillie Leslie
text: If I have to have another knee replacement done it will be with Doctor Maples. I tell all of my family and friends if they are in need of one Doctor Maples is the one to ask for.

name: steve garrison
text: North Alabama is lucky to have a orthopedic surgeon of Dr. Maples caliber . I had a knee replacement that was a total failure performed by someone else . Dr. Maples redone it and I was back to normal in three weeks . he is pretty amazing.

name: Rhonda Pro
text: Both of my total knee replacement surgeries were performed by Dr. Maples.  He has the best bedside manner of any surgeon I have ever dealt with.  His staff is amazing, caring, and kind. I would highly recommend him.

name: Gwen Cole
text: Great. Dr and nursing staff were so nice and helpful. Explained to me what would occur. Scheduling and payment were courteous and helpful also.

name: Antony Sharpe
text: Nothing but good things to say about Dr Maples and his staff. Great job with knee replacement and handling of Staph infection which occurred months later.  Always returns calls promptly and addresses all questions or problems.  I’m grateful for the way I’ve been treated.

name: Margaret Lacey
text: Very helpful and informative.  Treated me with total respect and dignity.  Would absolutely recommend Dr. Maples and TOC!!

name: Eve Towry
text: Everyone is extremely nice and friendly. His assistant is very informative about what was going on with me and they got me in and out in a timely manner.

name: Edna F. Aldridge
text: Dr Maples is the most caring doctor I’ve had the privilege of having as my surgeon. I hope I never have to have another orthopedic surgeon ever again.

name: Michael Whitley
text: Dr. Maples is a very talented surgeon and I would highly recommend him. The entire TOC operation is very efficient as well.

name: Pearlie Stamper
text:
I am a new patient of Dr. Maples, and this was my first experience visiting the TOC.  Dr. Maples explained everything about my elbow fracture to me, thoroughly and in a very professional manner; which included the x-rays; what the non-surgerical/surgerical and physical therapy options were, etc.
I was extremely satisfied with the medical care I received by Dr. Maples.

name: Really Santa
text: Dr Maples really knows his stuff. Great staff as well!!

name: Samantha Riggs
text: The staff is AMAZING. There isn't a long wait time. Normally you get in and out pretty quickly. Love it!!!!

name: Victoria Clendenon
text: Very through and discussed my options. Very prompt.

name: Jesse Gribble
text: Very efficient and very good at making you feel like you are his only patient.

name: Dee Hensley
text: My experience with Dr Maples is always awesome!!! His staff are always top notch ! His bedside manner is awesome!!!

name: Tracy Hudson
text: Prompt service, compassionate and methodical diagnosis.

name: DEBBIE1988JAMES
text: Dr Maples did a awesome job of fixing my arm and I am so thankful to him.

name: Mike L
text: Great doctor and awesome staff!

name: Dot Campbell
text: I felt like he knew what he was talking about and I have complete faith in him.

name: JWC1225
text: Dr. Sorrell is simply the best. He is a great surgeon and is very kind, compassionate and professional. He recently did a total left shoulder replacement on me, and I couldn't have asked for a more caring doctor. I highly recommend Dr. Sorrell.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Your recommendation means so much to us.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your comment. Have a great day!

name: Geoff Morgan
text: Excellent and professional.  The operating theater team is the best. New right shoulder, new left knee and doing very well.  I have my mobility back.

resp.text: We strive for 100% satisfaction, and we love to hear about these positive experiences!

name: Jay Drake
text: Yesterday, I rated my experience at the office and I though I had given 5 stars! That’s what I intended to do. They are so nice and accommodating and  Dr. Sorrell is so knowledgeable and a very nice Doctor. He really cares about his patients.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your rating!

name: Gayland Shrader
text: Dr. Sorrell has been my doctor since 2005. He is top notch, kind, listens well, concerned, and friendly. I like the way he begins his solution to my problems by being conservative in his treatments and not jumping the gun. I have Rheumatoid Arthritis and he has treated me for many bone and joint issues successfully over the years along with a broken ankle and arm. Dr. Sorrell is as good as it gets.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review!

name: Elaine Fuerst

text:
Dr. Sorrell is very gentle.  I had cortisone shots in my hand and thumb.  He cautioned that the shots may be painful even after deadening areas with Lidocaine. I have a very low pain threshold. Dr. Sorrell was so careful with the injections that I barely felt like a slight sting.

He is also very generous with his time. Dr. Sorrell took an interest in my back pain even though the back is not his area of expertise. It was so refreshing to have a conversation who was actually concerned with my pain.

I give Dr. Robert Sorrell my highest recommendation for his professional skills as well as his bedside manner!

name: Connie Allen
text:
Both Dr. Robert Sorrell and his PA, Doyle, we’re absolutely wonderful to
me during my recent visit to Lemak Health on 11/30/2020. I was seen promptly and made to feel comfortable and at ease. The care I received was exemplary and I left feeling thankful to have been in the care of knowledgeable, yet kind and caring professionals who had my best treatment, both medically and otherwise,  in the forefront of their decisions in regard to my broken wrist and bruised hip and leg.  I was contacted twice at home to see how things were going with my injuries and new, better fitted cast.  I was also scheduled for a return visit in one week to check the progress of my healing. The receptionist was very polite and welcoming too.  Lemak Heath Center was well-sanitized throughout - waiting room and treatment rooms and check out areas. Social distancing and masks were required which made me less apprehensive about being in a closed area during COVID. Definitely my kind of facility when needing excellent orthopedic care.
Connie Allen Romager
Patient

name: Amber Johnson
text: I saw Dr. Sorrell on Sept. 27, 2019. He told me he was going to have some prescriptions called in to my pharmacy specifically so that I would have the weekend to let them take effect before going back to work on Monday.  No prescriptions were called in. I called the Lemak answering service several times on Saturday.  It took over an hour to get an answer. The woman was rude, talked over me and repeatedly asked  for the same info re: my pharmacy. I finally spoke with someone at Lemak and was told that I would have to wait until Monday, but I could take up to 12 Advil per day in the meantime. She told me to call back on Monday. Which I did, leaving a message for Dr. Sorrell’s nurse. I didn’t receive a return call, but I have received notice from my pharmacy that the prescriptions have been filled. I will never go back to Lemak because of the poor customer service. The person I talked to from Lemak on Saturday should have taken my name and number and had someone call me on Monday since it was their mistake. I should not have had to chase them down. At the very least, I should have received a phone call acknowledging my message of this morning, apologizing for the inconvenience and letting me know they called in the prescriptions. It’s common courtesy and good customer service. And it’s poorly trained office staff than can drive away patients.

resp.text: We appreciate all reviews, and appreciate you giving us the chance to improve by providing us with this feedback. We appreciate you bringing this experience to our attention. If you are willing, please contact us at (205) 971-3348 so we can work towards a resolution. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Helen Sturgeon
text: Dr.  David Lemak is the best of the best and stands out among the rest. He does not make you feel rushed in an appointment. He carefully explained my situation, the surgery and what is ahead of me in terms I could understand.  He listened to all my questions and concerns and answered them to my complete satisfaction. The day after surgery when he came to visit me he explained he was going out of the country for a week and he gave me his cell number in case I needed him. How very impressive! Other physicians would have told me to call their associate if I needed anything or had any concerns. I have never had a physician that I have felt so comfortable with and that I feel has a genuine concern for my well being. My injury and surgery was very serious. I actually left Cullman Hospital Emergency Room after being there seven hours on Friday with this injury and went home with a severely broken leg and in a lot of pain until I could get to Dr. Lemak the following Monday for surgery due to Dr. Lemak's highly recommended reputation.  I knew I was making the right decision and it was worth waiting for him to be my physician for this injury and surgery. I will always highly recommend Dr. David Lemak  when given the opportunity to do so.
